scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Negative Photostat: Ancestry of the Kentucky Rifle, Positive Photostat: Ancestry of the Kentucky Rifle, Negative Photostat: Dillin Collection, Positive Photostat: Dillin Collection (top portion), Positive Photostat: Dillin Collection (bottom portion), Negative Photostat: Three Periods in Flint-locks, Negative Photostat: Colonial Period Weapons
